channel.title: general on Evil Inc.
channel.description: Recent content in general on Evil Inc.

item.title: Arming Henchmen: Hacking Guns
item.description: I recently watched a video on Wired about a person who found multiple ways to exploit a ‘smart gun’. You can watch that video here. TL;DR the gun is accompanied by a watch that, when it is close enough to the gun, allows it to shoot. The hacker is able to not only make the gun fire without having the watch nearby, but is also able to jam the signals between the watch and gun and prevent it from firing.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: You might have found yourself here and asked yourself the following questions, “How did I get here? Why am I reading a blog about a malignant enterprise? What is the point of the universe if it’ll end in a massive heat death anyway?”, to which I have the answers (except for the first and last one).
